Congratulations to Annie Aulsebrook who became an Alfred Deakin Postdoctoral Research Fellow at Deakin University, Melbourne, Australia. After having spent 3 years as a post-doc in our group working on activity and reproductive success in male pectoral sandpipers, Annie will now start a new research project: *When early birds take the night shift: Consequences of behavioural flexibility under changing conditions*.
